PurchaseQuantityRule.name: PurchaseQuantityRule
PurchaseQuantityRule.description: Represents a rule that restricts the quantity of a product that can be purchased. The rule can be an increment, minimum, or maximum rule.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency that’s specified on the buyer’s account. Default value is USD.

Increment.description: Quantity of product that can be added with each increase.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Maximum.description: Maximum quantity that can be purchased.

Minimum.description: Minimum quantity that can be purchased.

Name.description: Name of the purchase quantity rule.

OwnerId.description: ID of the creator of this object.
